name: Peter the Pariah Poltergeist Plunges into the Putrescent Prison
name_original: Peter the Pariah Poltergeist Plunges into the Putrescent Prison
description:
Help Peter escape the clutches of the Underworld he has been imprisoned to by dodging balls of brimstone as you offer Fallen Hearts to the Altruistic Altar!

For truest play, please fullscreen  Controls

-WASD to move

-Spacebar to pick up hearts and sacrifice them

-E to Dash

-Q to Freeze Time

Abilities

- Increased Speed-  Pretty explanatory (Requires 5 Hearts sacrificed)

- Dash -  Momentarily increases your speed, has a cooldown of five seconds (Requires 10 Hearts sacrificed

-Time Freeze - Ceases Fireball motion for four seconds, has a cooldown of fifteen seconds (Requires 15 Hearts sacrificed)

-Sacrifice twenty Hearts to free our beloved phantom.
